document_data.caption: A map showing Center Street in southern Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Center Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Center Street''' was a street located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Located in southern Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on the southern bank of the [[River Tesh]], Center Street was a small road in the western section of the Foreign Quarter that derived its name from running parallel in between [[Teshwave Street]] in the north and [[Twilight Street]] to the south. Center Street originated on [[Mace Way]] and merged with the major intersection to the east with [[Zhent Avenue]].
